result.adr_address: Hong Kong, 荃灣眾安街73號號地下
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 荃灣眾安街73號號地下
result.name: Great Restaurant Chicken Pot

reviews.text:
Great restaurant for eating yummy chicken pot (雞煲) at a fair price. You get a lot of ingredients, plus all their food tastes fresh and organic. For those who enjoy spicy cuisine, there's also a delicious sauce used that can bring out a lot of rich flavours from the food.

This restaurant is a little busy on weekends during peak hours, and you might possibly expect a queue, but it should be well worth the wait!
Good food, the staff is generally good attitude! Nice Atmosphere
Good food, a line worthy of your generous hot pot restaurants.

Apparently this is one of the best of the best claypot chicken in HK with different level of spiciness and add on . 
They have a few outlets and all of them are serving their quality dishes. It's a must try for any visitors to HK.
As i mentuoned earlier here,they have different level of spicy ajdnfie those who can't take spicy can always request for the least spicy pot instead.
Try to avoid the peek hour for lunch and dinner or otherwise Ubmay have to queue for easily 30 minutes to 45 minutes at least. 
Cheers and enjoy the chicken pot😉
long queue.....more than 1 hr wait.  But food was good.  Try to go early to avoid crowds

result.adr_address: 香港荃灣眾安街73號號地下
result.formatted_address: 香港荃灣眾安街73號號地下
result.name: 一品雞煲火鍋

reviews.text: 麻辣雞煲👍

Great restaurant for eating yummy chicken pot (雞煲) at a fair price. You get a lot of ingredients, plus all their food tastes fresh and organic. For those who enjoy spicy cuisine, there's also a delicious sauce used that can bring out a lot of rich flavours from the food.

This restaurant is a little busy on weekends during peak hours, and you might possibly expect a queue, but it should be well worth the wait!

香港朋友介紹的餐廳。位置於荃灣地鐵站不遠，餐廳在大樓地下，整層都是他們的，座位非常多，有沙發桌與多人圓桌。聽香港朋友說用餐時間都會坐滿，不過因為要趕飛機的緣故，所以六點早早就吃了，由於還不是香港用餐時間，不用等待便馬上入座。一開始店員會詢問你要點哪道主食，點菜的工作全權交給香港朋友負責，我們點了半隻雞，雞肉的辣度可以調整，我們是選擇小辣，怕辣的朋友吃起來也可以接受，不過整體而言偏麻，吃完後嘴巴整個麻，但是非常好吃過癮。吃完雞肉後，會用雞肉剩下的醬汁煮火鍋，就像在台灣吃火鍋一樣，想吃什麼就點什麼。值得一提的事，離開店家前，有提供除臭機器，幫忙消除身上肉味，非常貼心。

雞煲好味， 雞肉嫩滑。火煱配料新鮮但偏貴。
環境地方整潔，員工服務中上。
晚飯時間會大排長龍，要預早去或過了九點後會較好。
我同朋友一齊去食晚飯啲雞係臭嘅， 唔新鮮
